name: Let's make fried rice
description:
New Game!!

- Fried Rice game is renewed for mobile now!!!!

https://yando.itch.io/calico-friedrice-diner

Important Notice
  • LEAP Motion v2.2.1 has issue on tool tracking after sleep your computer. restart your laptop or leapd daemon will solve issue.
  • https://community.leapmotion.com/t/cannot-track-to...

Update
  • Final Alpha2 update textures, Rift support build again. (2015/01/08)
  • improved gaming logic and visual and sounds. (2015/01/07)
  • update Leap Motion VR asset to latest (2015/01/03)
How to control
  • press space key to start on title screen.
  • hold straight stick above Leap Motion to begin game on game screen.
  • catch ingredients with pan, then shake it around fire stove.
  • once ingredients glow, throw up above them to serve on the dish.
  • on your dish and customer's order match, you will get more score.
Notice
  • "Tool tracking" must be enabled on Leap Motion setting.
  • if your pan got frozen, move out your tool from Leap Motion area, then reenter in area.


Team
  • @yando
  • @nyakagawan
Credit
  • http://soundeffect-lab.info/
  • http://conte-de-fees.com/material/music_material_d...
